About 16,661 people were living in Addison as of the year 2020. It is really a city, but it calls themselves a town. Addison has an area of 4.4 square miles. == References == == Other websites == * Addison official website * Addison community website Category:Cities in Texas Category:Settlements in Dallas County, Texas
